item.title: If Ethereum breaks $4400, mainstream CEX total short liquidation volume will reach $928 million
item.description: On August 11th, based on Coinglass data, if Ethereum manages to break through $4400, the total short liquidation strength of mainstream CEXs will reach 928 million.Conversely, if Ethereum drops below $4200, the total long liquidation strength of mainstream CEXs will reach 705 million.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not provide the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the exact value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring liquidation clusters, that is, strength.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what extent the target price will be influenced when it reaches a certain position. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that particular point, a more intense reaction will occur due to a surge in liquidity.

item.title: Pump.fun Co-founder: Market Expected to See a Return to the 2024 Q4 pump.fun "Trench" Craze
item.description: On August 11th, Alon, a co-founder of Pump.fun, tweeted, "I have a feeling that we are on the verge of returning to the fourth quarter of 2024, where the 'trench' frenzy of pump.fun is about to happen again. However, this time, the rise will be even more significant."

item.title: Wangshi hopes Musk will rejoin the MAGA camp before the midterm election
item.description: On August 11th, according to market information, US Vice President Pence desires that Musk will re-enter the MAGA camp prior to the midterm elections. (ZeroHedge)

item.title: Michael Saylor: When banks start recommending Bitcoin, Bitcoin will surge to $10 million
item.description: On August 11th, according to a report from Cointelegraph, Michael Saylor, the founder of Strategy, stated, "When banks begin to recommend Bitcoin, the price of each Bitcoin will reach $10 million."

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Surpasses $4300
item.description: On August 11th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum has exceeded $4300, with a 24-hour fluctuation of 0.03%.

item.title: AguilaTrades has nearly closed its 25x leveraged short position on ETH in the early hours of today, resulting in a loss of $696,000.
item.description: On August 11th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), AguilaTrades nearly liquidated a 25x leveraged short position on ETH in the early morning. It suffered a 24-hour loss of $696,000 and currently holds only $386,000 in position.AguilaTrades's previous short position on ETH earned a profit of over $11.3 million.

item.title: ZORA briefly surged above $0.13, hitting a new all-time high
item.description: On August 11th, according to HTX market data, ZORA briefly rose above $0.13 and is currently trading at $0.125. It has witnessed a 24-hour price increase of 27.35%. Its market capitalization has reached $405 million, hitting a new all-time high.

item.title: Musk: Grok 4 is now freely available to all users
item.description: On August 11th, Musk tweeted that "Grok 4 has now become freely accessible to all users. The free plan enables a certain small number of queries per day, and a subscription is necessary if one wants to exceed that limit."

item.title: Suspected SharpLink Associated Address Withdraws 52,809 ETH from Coinbase Prime, Equivalent to Approximately $220 Million
item.description: On August 11th, as monitored by on-chain analyst Yu Jin, 10 hours ago, a newly created wallet withdrew 52,809 ETH ($220 million) from Coinbase Prime. Subsequently, it distributed the funds to 8 wallets for Ethereum staking. One of these wallets is the known address of SharpLink (SBET). Last Friday, SharpLink sold shares and raised $200 million. Therefore, it is highly likely that they converted these funds into ETH over the weekend.Currently, SharpLink (SBET) holds a latest ETH balance of approximately 621,000 ETH, with a value of $2.65 billion. The average purchase price is roughly $3,226.

item.title: Infini attacker has once again sold 1771 ETH today.
item.description: On August 11th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, the Infini attacker sold 1,771 ETH (valued at $7.44 million) today at an average price of $4,202.On February 24th, the attacker took advantage of a vulnerability and stole $49.5 million from Infini by purchasing 17,696 ETH at a price of $2,798. Leveraging the increase in the ETH price, on July 17th, they sold 1,770 ETH (worth $5.88 million) at $3,321 and transferred 4,501 ETH (worth $15.03 million) using Tornado Cash.
